#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
#define M  215372682525
LL xcal,ix;
LL a,d,n,x;
void solve(int n)
{
    xcal=1;
    ix=n;
    LL p=x;
    for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--){
        xcal=xcal+p;
        if(xcal>=M)
            xcal%=M;
        ix=ix+i*p;
        if(ix>=M)
            ix%=M;
        p=p*x;
        p%=M;
    }
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld",&a,&d,&n,&x);
        solve(n);
        LL ans=((a*xcal)%M+(d*ix)%M)%M;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
